Replies.Reply: He had polio when he was 6 years old. The disease left his body crippled but his mind remained sharp and alert, and since he wanted to be a writer, Mark O'Brien entered Cal to major in English and learn his trade.
And so, Mark O'Brien graduates from Cal, one of 250 English majors to receive degrees today.
